data.trans_hint: Anh ta sẵn sàng từ bỏ 20% vốn trong công ty của mình để đổi lấy 600,000 đô la.
data.en_hint: He's willing to give up 20% equity in his company in exchange for 600,000$.
data.content_game_1: He's willing to give up 20% equity in his company in exchange for 600,000$.
data.answer_en_hint: He's willing to give up 20% equity in his company in exchange for 600,000$.

data.trans: Chuẩn bị (cho một thời điểm hoặc sự kiện cụ thể)
data.trans_hint: Xây dựng bản thân để đạt được thành tích cao nhất vào ngày thi.
data.en_hint: Build yourself up to peak performance on the day of the exam.
data.content_game_1: Build yourself up to peak performance on the day of the exam.
data.answer_en_hint: Build yourself up to peak performance on the day of the exam.

data.trans: Ngừng, thôi không chú ý đến nữa
data.trans_hint: Nếu thấy chán thì anh ấy sẽ thôi không chú ý nữa và nhìn ra ngoài cửa sổ.
data.en_hint: If he gets bored, he just switches off and looks out the window.
data.content_game_1: If he gets bored, he just switches off and looks out the window.
data.answer_en_hint: If he gets bored, he just switches off and looks out the window.

data.trans: Dành phần lớn thời gian/năng lượng/tâm trí cho
data.trans_hint: Ông ấy dành toàn bộ tâm trí cho việc viết lách.
data.en_hint: He devoted himself entirely to writing.
data.content_game_1: He devoted himself entirely to writing.
data.answer_en_hint: He devoted himself entirely to writing.

data.trans_hint: Khi một ngày trôi qua, mọi thứ sẽ bình thường trở lại.
data.en_hint: When a day draws on, everything will be normal again.
data.content_game_1: When a day draws on, everything will be normal again.
data.answer_en_hint: When a day draws on, everything will be normal again.

data.content: a force to be reckoned with
data.trans_hint: Khi anh ta chiến thắng trận đấu, giới truyền thông đã bắt đầu coi anh ấy là một đối thủ đáng gờm.
data.en_hint: When he won the game, the media started to consider him as a force to be reckoned with.
data.content_game_1: When he won the game, the media started to consider him as a force to be reckoned with.
data.answer_en_hint: When he won the game, the media started to consider him as a force to be reckoned with.

data.trans_hint: Trước trận đấu, kiềm chế mọi thứ để không để những tiêu cực ảnh hưởng đến tinh thần là cực kỳ quan trọng.
data.en_hint: Before the game, it is important to bottle things up in order not to let the negativity affect the spirit.
data.content_game_1: Before the game, it is important to bottle things up in order not to let the negativity affect the spirit.
data.answer_en_hint: Before the game, it is important to bottle things up in order not to let the negativity affect the spirit.

data.trans_hint: Nhiều người giữ kín nỗi sợ về việc đánh mất chính mình, nhưng tôi nghĩ nó là bình thường khi có cảm giác sợ hãi.
data.en_hint: Many people keep the fear of losing to themselves, but I think it is normal to have that kind of fear.
data.content_game_1: Many people keep the fear of losing to themselves, but I think it is normal to have that kind of fear.
data.answer_en_hint: Many people keep the fear of losing to themselves, but I think it is normal to have that kind of fear.

data.trans_hint: Những suy nghĩ tiêu cực đôi khi trở nên quan trọng hơn thực tế và phóng đại mức độ nghiêm trọng của tình huống.
data.en_hint: Negative thoughts sometimes take over from the reality and exaggerate the seriousness of the situation.
data.content_game_1: Negative thoughts sometimes take over from the reality and exaggerate the seriousness of the situation.
data.answer_en_hint: Negative thoughts sometimes take over from the reality and exaggerate the seriousness of the situation.
